text:
For the upcoming live, if you have any preferences for
the costume, I'd like to hear your ideas.

Hmm...
Asking out of nowhere like that, I don't really...

Alternatively, if there are any clothes that you
think would bother you, that would also be helpful.

Speaking of which, since you have an image of being into fashion,
What do you think about clothes that don't really fit your tastes?

It doesn't really bother me much.
I can generally make use of any clothes.

I can also adjust them to my tastes. Even when they don't
quite fit my taste, that can be enjoyable in itself.

Producer,
What do you think about also changing styles sometime?

If you try wearing something fluffly and frilly,
you might get a better idea of how we feel afterall.

Eh? N-No, that sounds a bit...
I think I can make do without going that far... haha...
